block.minecraft.bed.active_war: You may not rest now; you are in a war
command.exception.player_is_in_war: %1$s is currently or recently in a war
command.exception.player_self_is_in_war: You are currently or recently in a war
command.exception.player_is_not_in_war: %1$s is not currently in a war
command.exception.player_self_is_not_in_: You are not currently in a war
command.exception.player_has_pending_rec: %1$s cannot be invited; they already have a pending invitation
command.exception.no_recruit_exists: You do not have any war recruit invites
command.war.accept.failure.max_players: Cannot accept recruit request; %1$s of %2$s players have joined the war
command.war.declare.success.feedback: You invited %1$s players to join your war. Recruiting will close in %2$s seconds.
command.war.deny.success: You did not join the war
command.war.invite.failure.max_players: Cannot send recruit request; %1$s of %2$s players have joined the war
item.sswar.war_compass.tooltip.descripti: Use to track enemy; Sneak-use to track teammate
message.war.lifecycle.recruit.prompt: A war is starting, do you want to participate?
message.war.lifecycle.start_preparation: Start preparing for war! You are on team:
message.war.lifecycle.activate: Preparation period is over! Fight for your life!
message.war.event.forfeit: %1$s has forfeited; %2$s more forfeits from %3$s team to end the war
message.war.event.death: %1$s died; %2$s players have not died on %3$s team
message.war.lifecycle.end.forfeit: The war is ended! %1$s team forfeits, $2$s team wins
message.war.lifecycle.end.win: The war is ended! %1$s team wins
